subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Cycling, Road
lead_paragraph: The 2014 Tour de France, starting in Leeds, England, will have only 33 miles of time trials, all on the second-to-last stage.
snippet: The 2014 Tour de France, starting in Leeds, England, will have only 33 miles of time trials, all on the second-to-last stage.
